BackstoryDef.title: demon-born twin
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: Born as the son of the legendary Dark Knight Sparda, [PAWN_nameDef] witnessed [PAWN_possessive] mother's death and blamed [PAWN_possessive] own weakness. Unlike [PAWN_possessive] twin brother, [PAWN_pronoun] became obsessed with obtaining power to never feel helpless again. [PAWN_pronoun] spent [PAWN_possessive] childhood in solitary training, rejecting social connections as distractions from [PAWN_possessive] pursuit of strength.

BackstoryDef.title: seeker of ultimate power
BackstoryDef.baseDesc: [PAWN_nameDef] pursued ultimate power at any cost, even splitting [PAWN_possessive] human and demon halves to achieve it. [PAWN_pronoun] mastered the legendary Yamato sword and developed spatial cutting techniques that can slice through dimensions. Though [PAWN_possessive] quest for power led to defeat and humiliation, [PAWN_pronoun] has learned to temper [PAWN_possessive] obsession with a newfound understanding of what truly matters. [PAWN_possessive] precision in combat is unmatched, but [PAWN_pronoun] remains cold and antisocial.
